TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowItemPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView
Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowItemPresenter Inherits ContentControl Implements ICompositeView

summary.span: 提供一个可视化的编辑器来编辑 对象，并为用户提供一个区域来拖放和以其他方式编辑组合元素。

span.span: Provides a visual editor to edit objects, and provides an area for the user to drag and drop, and otherwise edit composed elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 它充当编辑容器显示数据的可视化效果的控件绑定到中属性。This is a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) control that acts as an editing container that displays the visualization for the data it is bound to in the property. 是可用于创建对组合元素进行可视化和编辑的容器的两个控件之一（另一个为 ）。The is one of two controls (the other being ) that can be used to create a container for visualizing and editing a composed element. 请务必注意，组合元素的可视化不由 控制，但它使用与给定类型的元数据存储关联的可视化呈现。It is important to note that the visualization of the composed element is not controlled by the but it renders with the visualization associated in the metadata store for a given type. 是 WPF 的专用的子类它已经过修改以支持拖动并放置、 复制和粘贴和其他可视化编辑操作。The is a specialized subclass of the WPF that has been modified to support drag and drop, copy and paste, and other visual editing actions. ## Examples 将主要在活动设计器中使用此控件，如下面的示例代码所示。The primary use of this control will be in an activity designer, as seen in the sample code below. 下面的 XAML 演示了该控件为 If 活动生成一个简单的设计器的声明性用法。The XAML below shows the declarative usage of the control to build a simple designer for the If activity. If 活动具有两个类型为 Activity 的属性：Then 和 Else，并且每个 WorkflowItemPresenter 的 Item 都链接到该相应的属性。The If activity has two properties of type Activity, Then and Else, and the Item for each WorkflowItemPresenter is linked to that respective property. 有关的示例正在使用中，请参阅[自定义复合设计器 — 工作流项演示器](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-item-presenter.md)示例。For an example of the in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Item Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-item-presenter.md) sample. ```xaml ```
